remarks: If two multipliers are congruent relative to the base point's order, the corresponding multiples are the same.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Sep-2015.)
statement:
odcl.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odcl.2 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odid.3 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
odid.4 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
mndodcong $p |- ( ( ( G e. Mnd /\ A e. X ) /\ ( M e. NN0 /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ ( O ` A ) e. NN ) -> ( ( O ` A ) || ( M - N ) <-> ( M .x. A ) = ( N .x. A ) ) ) $.
